public abstract class AbstractJsonResponseServlet
extends SlingAllMethodsServlet

Base servlet for writing a JSON response.

Write an object to the response as JSON.

response - sling response

writeJsonResponse

protected final void writeJsonResponse(SlingHttpServletResponse response,
                                       Object object,
                                       String dateFormat)
                                throws IOException
Write an object to the response as JSON.

Parameters:
response - sling response
object - object to be written as JSON
dateFormat - SimpleDateFormat pattern for formatting Date objects using US locale
Throws:
IOException - if error occurs writing JSON response

writeJsonResponse

protected final void writeJsonResponse(SlingHttpServletResponse response,
                                       Object object,
                                       String dateFormat,
                                       Locale locale)
                                throws IOException
Write an object to the response as JSON.

Parameters:
response - sling response
object - object to be written as JSON
dateFormat - SimpleDateFormat pattern for formatting Date objects
locale - locale for date format
Throws:
IOException - if error occurs writing JSON response

writeJsonResponse

protected void writeJsonResponse(SlingHttpServletResponse response,
                                 ObjectMapper mapper,
                                 Object object)
                          throws IOException
Write an object to the response as JSON using the given ObjectMapper instance.

Parameters:
response - Sling response
mapper - object mapper with a custom configuration
object - object to be written as JSON
Throws:
IOException - if error occurs writing JSON response
